title: Remote-Based Career Counseling and Spatial Ability Integrated Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Program targeting 12th-grade learners (pre-university) emphasizing spatial cognition enhancement for daily/professional environments and career design skill development.

learning_goals: Learners can explain and visualize spatial concepts (dimensions, planes, point/line relationships) with 80% accuracy using 3D modeling tools
Learners can create career plans incorporating peer feedback through remote collaboration platforms
Learners complete practical tasks (e.g., urban planning simulations) applying spatial reasoning skills in case-based problem-solving activities with over 70% accuracy
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
